oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effects of postpartum oral calcium supplementation on productive and reproductive outcomes in multiparous Jersey cows
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Valldecabres, A.
Silva-del-RÃ­o, N.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: calcium
supplementation
postpartum
lactation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The detrimental effects that subclinical hypocalcemia has on postpartum performance, and the lack of a cow-side diagnostic tool, drives researchers to focus on designing preventive management strategies. The objectives of this study were to evaluate the effect of prophylactic supplementation with oral calcium boluses after calving on productive and reproductive outcomes.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2018; 319
